channel.title: Need Help connection to my server ip
channel.description:
I can run the server and login but i cant connect to my world because my world is linked with my ip but the server is running in localhost (127.0.0.1). I cant figure out how to change the ip i looked in
Loader.java client.java
and cant figure it out. I am using Jolt v2.
I attacted the two files for anyone to download if they wish to help.
